title: More schools offering counseling in lieu of suspensions, expulsions
text:
More schools offering counseling in lieu of suspensions, expulsions 
Published By: Cleveland.com - Yesterday 
Many districts have been foregoing automatic suspensions, expulsions and calls to the police for one-on-one counseling and less severe forms...
